name: about myself
body:
### Welcome to my site.

Hello There. This is Devendra Naga (shortly known as dev / devnaga). I am a software developer / maintainer and a creator of much scalable and creative software packages and tools. I have worked at Savari (www.savarinetworks.com) as a Technical Lead to their products (RSU and OBU). Being in Savari i have developed the products from ground up with a team of just 2 to 3 people.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
